Final

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • Final.Recipe

  • public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates recipes to be added to the recipe list.

      • adjustPortion

        public Recipe adjustPortion(Recipe input)
        This method takes a recipe as an argument and adjusts it based on the percentage that is entered by the user. It also creates a new recipe with a new name indicating the percentage it was scaled to.
        Parameters:
        input - is recipe name that needs to be scaled
        Returns:
        the adjusted recipe based on proportion required
